project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based portal that enables customers to securely access onboarding resources, track their progress, and view usage metrics for the main SaaS product.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in to the COSP using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Successful login from main SaaS product credentials

feature_breakdown.description: Display a customized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Accurate display of checklist items based on subscription tier

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to provide seamless content search and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Successful retrieval and display of knowledge base articles

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's usage metrics for the main SaaS product.
acceptance_criteria: Accurate representation of key usage metrics

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Successful ticket/email creation with customer details

technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests -> Frontend -> Backend API -> Database/Cache -> External APIs -> Response to Frontend
security_considerations: Implement OAuth 2.0 and SAML 2.0 for secure authentication
Use TLS 1.2+ for all API communications
Enforce role-based access control (RBAC) for sensitive data
Regularly audit and update security policies to comply with ISO 27001

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP, including secure login, personalized onboarding checklists, and knowledge base integration.
deliverables: Fully functional MVP release of the COSP

implementation_phases.description: Implement the adoption metrics dashboard to provide customers with insights into their usage of the main SaaS product.
deliverables: Adoption metrics dashboard integrated into the COSP

implementation_phases.description: Integrate the 'Contact CSM' feature to enable efficient support for customers.
deliverables: Contact CSM functionality integrated into the COSP

risk_analysis.description: Complexity in integrating with multiple third-party APIs (SSO, Knowledge Base, Metrics, Zendesk)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Allocate sufficient time for API integration testing and error handling, establish clear communication channels with third-party vendors

risk_analysis.description: Potential performance issues due to high user concurrency and data loads
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement caching strategies, optimize database queries, and conduct load testing to identify and address performance bottlenecks

risk_analysis.description: Difficulty in meeting the 6-month timeline for the MVP release
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Prioritize features based on business impact, establish clear milestones and tracking, and allocate additional resources if necessary

risk_analysis.description: Challenges in ensuring a seamless user experience across different devices and browsers
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement responsive design principles, conduct extensive cross-browser testing, and gather user feedback to identify and address usability issues

infrastructure_needs: Managed Kubernetes cluster (e.g., AWS EKS, Azure AKS, GCP GKE)
Managed PostgreSQL database (e.g., AWS RDS, Azure SQL Database, Google Cloud SQL)
Managed Redis cache (e.g., AWS ElastiCache, Azure Cache for Redis, Google Cloud Memorystore)

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze customer retention data from the CRM system

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce average TTV from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track customer feature adoption data from the COSP

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent by CSMs on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor CSM productivity metrics and survey feedback

success_metrics.target_value: Increase the percentage of support questions resolved via the portal to 40%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze support ticket data and user engagement metrics from the COSP
